INSERT INTO TodoList(doNum, doName, doWhen, doEnd, doAllDay, color, done, parentNum, path, pos, depth, groupNum, userNum) VALUES
(#{todo.doNum}, #{todo.doName}, concat(#{todo.doWhen}, ' ', #{todo.doWhenTime}), concat(#{todo.doEnd}, ' ', #{todo.doEndTime}), #{todo.doAllDay}, #{todo.color}, #{todo.done}, #{todo.parentNum}, #{todo.path}, #{todo.pos}, #{todo.depth}, #{groupNum}, (SELECT userNum FROM Users WHERE id=#{id}))
